metadata.description:
Collects Dr. Strange stories from Strange Tales (1987) #1-19 and the Cloak & Dagger story from #7.

It's Dr. Strange as you've never seen him before: as an eye-patch-wearing wielder of black magic! See him take on the deadliest foes in any dimension: Khat, Erlik Khan, Shuma-Gorath, Enitharmon the Weaver and more! Guest-starring the Defenders, Valkyrie, Cloak and Dagger, and some of Strange's closest friends - including Rintrah, Topaz, Clea and Wong!
metadata.name: Strange Tales
